resources.string: Please enter the number of pages or toggle percent tracking
Do you want to associate the %s existing readings on this device with your Readmill account?
Spent a total of 19 hours and 45 minutes\nOver 38 reading sessions.

This will DELETE the book, both from your device AND from your Readmill profile.

All related data such as highlights and progress will also be delete.

There is NO WAY to restore it.

This will DELETE the book from your device.

All related data such as highlights and progress will also be delete.

There is NO WAY to restore it.
Helps you get all your reading into your Readmill account

ReadTracker is a tool for keeping track of what and how you read your books.

Add the book you’re currently reading to ReadTracker and start the timer every time you sit down to read.

After a while ReadTracker will be able to give you some insight into how you read and give a prediction on how long you have left.

When you’ve completed the book you’ll get a summary of your reading. And you can write a short note about what you thought of it that you can share with your friends, or just keep for your future self.

More info www.readtracker.com

Book will be visible on your Readmill profile. Friends who follow you will see when you start reading, finish reading or create highlights.\n\nYour activity might also be shared to Facebook or Twitter depending on what you have activated for your Readmill account.
Book will be visible only to you on your Readmill profile.\n\nNo one else can see that you are reading it, and nothing is ever shared to other services like Facebook and Twitter.
